name: Tails and Pines
description:
Wishlist our new game My Furry Dragon:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1818370/My_Furry_Dragon/

This is a story about two friends, Stacey and April, who didn`t see each other for almost a decade. After school graduations Stacey decided to move to a big city, while April remained in their hometown. Now, when they meet again, a new strange feeling arises in them, but they have to understand each other and reminisce about their past first in order to be together.

Tails and Pines is a short novel about envy, love, relationship and achieving your dreams. Realize your dreams though abandoning everything, or abandon them completely to remain yourself? Or, perhaps, neither path is right?
Find the answers yourself in “Tails and Pines”!

This game includes:
• Fascinating story with romance and comedy elements.
• HD fully original artworks.
• ≈ 1,5 hours of content.
• Relaxing atmosphere.
• Great music.
